name: Catch these eggs!
description:
For a better immersion, try opening the game in full screen.

The rules of the game are simple:

You collect eggs — you get points

Eggs break — you lose lives

Character Control:

A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow — your movement

And that's probably all... Heh heh

Don't be scared if the hens don't lay eggs first, let them get used to you a little.

And yes, try not to miss the GOLDEN eggs, they are obviously more expensive than usual
